about.title: About me
about.bio: I am a software developer with a strong interest in building responsive, user-friendly web applications. With experience in both frontend and backend development, I am comfortable working with a variety of technologies and frameworks. I am always eager to learn new things and take on new challenges.
about.educationTitle3: Udemy The Complete 2024 Web Development Bootcamp
about.educationTitle5: Udemy React Native - The Practical Guide
about.jobDescription1: I was working in Kaunas university of technology as a project technician. I had to maintain and develop the MOODLE platform and other web applications.
about.jobDescription2: Currently i am working as a business application specialist in FESTO. I have to create business apps using SAP, BTP, ABAP and other technologies.
